articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Elon Musk says fees for some users may be coming to Twitter
articles.description: Elon Musk said Twitter might soon charge fees for certain users, as the billionaire continues to tease how he might change the platform as its new owner.
articles.content: Elon Musk said Twitter might soon charge fees for certain users, as the billionaire continues to tease how he might change the platform as its new owner.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez
articles.title: Stanford University announces new climate change school with $1.1 billion from renowned venture capitalist
articles.description: Stanford University announced Wednesday it is launching a new school later this year focused on climate change and funded by John Doerr, a renowned Silicon Valley venture capitalist.
articles.content: Stanford University announced Wednesday it is launching a new school later this year focused on climate change and funded by John Doerr.
